# Project Context
Project: Financial Quest
Description: A guided path to financial calm using Flowchart methodology.
Domain: https://financial-independence.melson.us

# Core Concepts
- Flowchart: Based on r/personalfinance Prime Directive.
- Tax Years: Defaults to upcoming year limits.
- Privacy: Local-only storage. No server-side persistence.

# Architecture
- Stack: Next.js 14, React, Tailwind CSS.
- Pattern: Feature-Sliced Design (FSD).
- Rendering: Client-side heavy (interactive flowchart).

# Content
- /: Main flowchart application.
- /faq: Frequently Asked Questions about methodology and data.
- /howto: Guide on how to use the interactive tools.
